entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border. Snowfall amount 2 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
